name: Arcanine

passive.name: Honorbound
passive.effect: Place a coin face-up on the table. For all effects that flip a coin, each player uses the face-up side. Whenever you do, flip the coin to the other side.

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Arcanine.

flavor: These Pokemon are loyal to a fault. Some trainers are frustrated by their lack of ambition, but others praise their code of honor.
